item.title: ★ LuckScape ★ Best 667 ★ Ironman Mode ★ All Working Skills ★ Boss pets ★
item.dc:creator: @Luckscape Luckscape
item.description:
@Luckscape wrote:

  • Added in Callisto (beta)
  • Added a knife and anti-fire shield to the general store
  • Fixed Sunfreet’s safespot
  • Added the correct animations to sunfreet
  • Fixed all the hiscores not adding up the correct combat level
  • Removed some easter eggs in the source
  • Fixed a bug in the appearance class, causing certain items to clip through walls
  • Buffed ironman xp rate a bit
  • Added a log for all players that gets a 99
  • Made it so when staff handle a ticket it automatically teleports them to staff zone
  • Fixed a bug where you could cook through a wall
  • Removed the staircases from lumbridge that allowed people to run around on other levels
  • Made it so ironmen can access the hunter store
  • Added in the rune essence mine
  • Allowed ironmen to access the rune essence mine teleport
  • Added the ability to use the drop pickaxe at the rune essence mine
  • Reduced the amount of profit from cutting dstones, you now only make 20k per stone, not 60k
  • Buffed ironmans xp rate so its no longer slower than rs3
  • Buffed Hardmans xp rate so its not the same as ironman
  • Fixed nex not dropping items
  • Fixed tds and zammy not being added to npclog
  • Fixed nex not being added to npclog
  • Added shadowstrykewyrm to npclog
  • Fixed slayer kills giving null exception
  • Fixed an error that made slayer monsters never die
  • Added in bandos minions
  • Fixed a null pointer exception with the drop rate boosts

Read full topic

item.title: ★ LuckScape ★ Best 667 ★ Ironman Mode ★ All Working Skills ★ Boss pets ★
item.dc:creator: @Luckscape Luckscape
item.description:
@Luckscape wrote:

Heres the latest updates + 50m giveaway @ 10players online today!

  • New forums

  • Eco reset

  • Moved home to keldagrim

  • Nerfed bandos drop rate

  • Nerfed corp drop rate

  • Nerfed sunfreet drop rate

  • Nerfed blink drop rate

  • Nerfed bandos drop rate

  • Nerfed kbd drop rate

  • Nerfed kk drop rate

  • Nerfed dks drop rate

  • Added 4 new game modes when starting;

  • Squire

  • Knight

  • Champion

  • Ironman
    They all have their own xp rate and drop rate boost

  • Changed the vote rewards to 500k

  • Made shop prices cheaper for items

  • Made sell prices cheaper

  • Changed the starter kit to match your game mode

  • Adjusted the vote shop and added some good items/cosmetics

  • Loads of new forum updates that include

  • Added a loading screen

  • Forum statistics all in one at the bottom

  • New chat box

  • Added in the general just like RS

  • Updated the hiscores to the newest version that king fox released

  • Made a custom theme to match the website and forums for the hiscores

  • Began work on making separate hiscores for each game-mode

  • Fixed friend chats so you can now make your own

  • Made the support system available to the public

  • Fixed an error with mysql not connecting

  • Made rings (i) non-tradeable

  • Made ironman armour only equipable by the ironman gamemode

  • Changed the home teleport to the new home

  • Fixed inviting players with the ring of kinship

  • Made dicing broadcast in friends chat

  • Added the vote link to forums

  • Added a facebook slideout panel on the right

  • Added a command to remove extreme donator

  • Now when I give users for instance, super donator, it’ll give them super and donator permissions so i dont have to do two commands

  • Removed the cash drop from mutated jadinko babies

  • Fixed skilling interfaces causing crashes

  • Removed the shops at dz (they’re coming back later with new shops)

  • Added the fremnick helms to shops at home

  • Fixed a colour issue with dicing in friends chats

  • Fixed a bug with ironman armour that let nobody equip it, than everyone could equip it

  • Removed the dying man from dz

  • Added in Hiscores for each game mode

  • Integrated the vote into our main website

  • Made the dicing feed only appear in friend chat, not public chat

  • Fixed a css issue with the hiscores

  • Added in rev drops

  • Fixed a php error with the hiscores that mismatched the different modes

  • Added bows to the range shop

  • Made the lever at the avatar of destruction now teleport to the new home

  • When exiting the pvp portals at edgeville it’ll now teleport you to the new home instead of the old one

  • Added the new hiscores links on the forums and website

  • ::cash only gives 15k now

  • Made the xp rates a little bit higher for knight

  • Nerfed rev drops

  • Nerfed champions xp rates after buffing them

  • Fixed a probem with the server nulling when chopping a tree

  • Fixed a spelling mistake in the teleport dialogue

  • Fixed an issue with wilderness teleports

  • Fixed slayer

  • Added a 45 dung requirement for gravite items

  • Added an interface that pops up when you log in

  • Changed and added trivia questions

  • Added a 5 minute timer to yells if not a donator

  • Re-added donator xp boost but at a lower rate

  • Slowed the appearance of trivia messages now its every 2minutes

  • Fixed a bug with the yell timer causing yells to not show up

  • Fixed a bug with the donator xp boost

Read full topic

item.title: ★ LuckScape ★ Best 667 ★ Ironman Mode ★ All Working Skills ★ Boss pets ★
item.dc:creator: @Luckscape Luckscape
item.description:
@Luckscape wrote:

  • Fixed an error with the server shutting down due to lacking java memory

  • Fixed a bug that nulled some accounts

  • Added in Mysterious Crate Drops Throughout The Wilderness

  • Added Forum icons

  • Added more categories to the forums

  • Organised the categories on the forum

  • Fixed a bug with Mysterious Crates giving incorrect items

  • Added our banner to the Forums footer

  • Added in a basis for P-O-H

  • Fixed Mysterious Crates

  • Updated the veng message so it now tells you how long till you can cast it

  • Work on dungeoneering rooms

  • Added in a method to check if user has skill level requirements

  • Added in pest control monsters

  • Added in a LOT of work to pest control. Close to release

  • Added in a method for ‘digging’

  • Added in fully working clue scrolls

  • Removed User Group Titles on the forums, now it just shows the userbar

  • Added in postbit images for donator +

  • Fixed world messages

  • Fixed the rock cake so it won’t let you bite it if your health is 50 or lower

  • Changed the rock cake to the proper ‘dwarven rock cake’

  • Custom quest work! Very Happy

  • Fixed it so untradeable items are now destroyed on death

  • Added the proper rock cake to the shops

  • Made ironman armour equippable only by IRONMEN

  • Made the legends cape only equippable with 50 prestige

  • Added ::itemn to admin’s commands

  • Fixed an error with the point interface

  • Added in lottery

  • Added in the lottery npc to edgeville

  • Added in tileMessages, hovering messages like tizenx, above important things

  • Added the ability to turn on and off trivia messages via ::enables

  • Fixed an error when turning on and off trivia messages it’d reset the interface

  • Reduced the frequency of trivia messages appearing

  • Made fight caves the full wave length not just jad

  • Removed jad from spawning in the fight caves before getting to his wave

  • Added a new area in edgeville

  • Made “Magic Barriers” teleport you to the new area in edgeville

  • Added a penguin with 100k hp to the new area

  • Added a system that for every damage dealt to the penguin you get a token

  • Renamed the tokens to damage tokens

  • Fixed a mistype that teleport you to the wrong area when activating the magic barriers

  • Fixed an error that gave you the incorrect amount of damage tokens

  • Replaced the magic barriers with invisible objects

  • Changed the amount of damage tokens given

  • Added more penguins to the new area

Read full topic

item.title: ★ LuckScape ★ Best 667 ★ Ironman Mode ★ All Working Skills ★ Boss pets ★
item.dc:creator: @Luckscape Luckscape
item.description:
@Luckscape wrote:

  • Swapped The Special Item Store NPC
  • Moved Mandrith to Edgeville
  • Fixed Corp
  • Added a dialogue to Mandrith (pk stuff)
  • Added in a use for artifacts, which is to sell them to mandrith
  • Redid vote rewards so if you don’t have an inventory space it’ll send the item to your bank
  • Added in pk tokens
  • Made artifacts sellable for pk tokens
  • Made a shop that lets you buy pk equipment with pk tokens
  • Added in a method that lets me rename objects
  • Fixed dark beast
  • Added in evil trees
  • Added in familiar benefits
  • Removed evil trees
  • Added in a new and improved kdr
  • Redid ancient effigys

06/08/2015

  • Added in giant mole

  • Added in ascensions as a drop from giant mole

  • Made giant mole multi-combat

  • Buffed giant mole to 20k hp

  • Buffed giant moles stats

  • Added in giant mole teleports as a command in the main teleport section

  • Set ruby bolt (e) cap

  • Added ls tokens to most bosses

  • Added Vorago and Giant Mole to :vmscore

  • Fixed an issue with artifact selling

  • Buffed Armadyl Godsword

  • Buffed Ascension crossbows

  • Added a “portal” page to the forums

  • Forum improvements in general

  • Website optimizations including speed

7/08/2015

  • Increased Giant Mole Drop Rate For Ascensions

  • Added In Tokhaar-Kal-Mej with the appropriate stats

  • Changed the Tokhaar-Kal to Tokhaar-Kal-Ket

  • Added Tokhaar-Kal-Mej to the vote shop

  • Made Tokhaar-kal-*** capes non-donor

  • Fixed the Corp Fix

  • Added a new method to check if a tile is empty

  • Patched the vorago safespots

  • Removed some glitched spots where the giant mole’s loot didnt appear

  • Modified some item prices

  • Deleted Shitty Customs that were in the cache

  • Got some new banners

  • Removed some useless content

  • Added an automatic application system to the forums

  • Added forum moderator available to apply

  • Fixed an issue with ascension crossbows removing all bonuses

  • Changed the amount of artifacts given when you pk somebody

  • Nerfed the ascension drop rates, Mainhand is now 1.5 and Offhand is 1.7

  • Changed the message when claiming vote reward of 50m coins to say 50m instead of 10m

  • Removed some safespots at other bosses

  • Added some new ip commands to moderators

9/8/2015

  • Made it so range strength bonuses stack
  • Added range strength bonuses to ascensions so they are now the best range weapons in-game
  • Added in the Shadow Strykewyrm Boss
  • Moved the clan wars portals to edgeville
  • Added in Mitus, the baby Shadow Strykewyrm
  • Added a dialogue to Mitus that lets you teleport to the Shadow Strykewyrm Boss
  • Buffed the Shadow Strykewyrm
  • Made Shadow Strykewyrms visible on the minimap
  • Added all the combat shops to edgeville for easier access when pking
  • Moved the Gambler to edgeville
  • Added Mitus to edgeville
  • Capitalized the names of teleports when you teleport to them with a command
  • Added wilderness warning notices when teleporting to the Shadowyrm Boss
  • Removed the ‘rest’ and ‘seat’ commands
  • Nerfed the ascension bonus to a more reasonable bonus, still staying the best range weapons
  • Added a raffle system to the forums
  • Added a Weekly 500m Raffle and a Monthly Donator Rank Raffle
  • Removed all applications from the nav bar on the forums and added custom ones
  • Nerfed the Hand Cannon
  • Made summoning charms untradeable

10/08/2015

  • Made Shadowyrm a multi zone
  • Increased the Shadowyrm’s combat range
  • Added the Shadowyrm’s drops
  • Moved the trivia reward shop NPC to the other side of home
  • Changed gem sell prices so you now make profit when crafting gems
  • Changed the gem prices again so you actually make profit on ALL the gems
  • Added more vote links
  • Made it so the website will actually load the hiscores
  • Removed duplicate uncut rubies from the skilling shop
  • Added the ‘LuckScape Cape’ which can be obtained at 5b xp
  • Removed some of the server rules

Sirenic Drop Rates At The Shadowyrm

Sirenic Mask - 1.9
Sirenic Hauberk - 1.5
Sirenic Chaps - 1.7
Sirenic Gauntlets - 2
Sirenic Boots - 2

12/08/2015

  • Fixed a bug with dragon darts and hand cannon shots
  • Removed range bonus stacking
  • Removed ascension crossbow range strength bonuses
  • Added in ascension bolts
  • Added ascension bolts to shops
  • Fixed a bug with sirenic causing range strength to go to 2
  • Fixed a bug where ascension bolts could be bought for low and sold for higher
  • Added in the adventure log settings thing in the settings menu
  • Added in accept-aid
  • Removed the toolbelt from the equipment tab due to it crashing clients and not working
  • Got a new banner
  • Began work on adding in some new quests

Here’s the banner

Jcp4eW7.gif728×90

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Luckscape Luckscape
item.description:
@Luckscape wrote:

fatkidslag:

Server client contains malware. LOl.

That’s very strange, your antivirus is picking up false things…

  • Enhanced website speed
  • Added a custom ‘support’ feature
  • Fixed the info (task) tab
  • Added a vote point store
  • Added items to the store
  • Added vote point system, everytime you claim you get a vote point, once you have 31 points you can buy a bond for a day donor
  • Re-arranged npcs neatly at home

Huge amounts of forum updates

  • Top Posters
  • Fixed the Shoutbox Image
  • Staff Online
  • Legend
  • Members Online Today
  • Added in ipb donation software
  • Fixed a cwars bug
  • Fixed some broken models
  • Changed the amount of coins received from voting
  • Added a PVP Armour Box as a vote reward
  • Added correct server time
  • Fixed an issue with TDs not counting towards comp
  • Added in duel arena like TizenX
  • Fixed a bug with trade from the duel arena
  • Fixed the drop issue, now the player who deals most damage will get the drop
  • Began work on making pking great, added artefacts
  • Fixed the client
  • Made the website ssl secure
  • Fixed the broken forums due to ssl
  • Added comp cape features
  • Fixed a few broken dialogues
  • Removed some stupid commands
  • Fixed donation store
  • Got advertisements on some toplists
  • Began work on gravestones
  • Added in Hans and the veteran cape which can be received when you have the playtime of 10 days.

Come Play!!!
